Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes the buy New York produce tax credit
Summary: Establishes the buy New York produce tax credit; provides a tax credit for food service establishments for ten percent of the total receipts of New York produced farm products purchased, not to exceed one thousand dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing the buy New York produce tax credit
